Articles.Content:
I just made this rocket as a test of some mod parts, but I kind of liked it. It sort of looks like a Soyuz (at least in layout) with a service, decent and orbital module.

The whole rocket requires various modparts including, but not limited to:

-Sunday Punch\'s

-Nova Silisko\'s (both main pack and lander)

-Captain Slug\'s (radial engines and payload fairings)

-KW pack

I downloaded all the mods from that list you made, but when I try to load the ship it says I\'m missing parts, are there

any mods you forgot to mention? I\'d really like to fly this ship, it seems really cool.
Nope, it only uses stuff I\'ve listed (bear in mind that Nova and Slug\'s stuff is from more than one download).

Nope, it only uses stuff I\'ve listed (bear in mind that Nova and Slug\'s stuff is from more than one download).

By the Nova Silisko pack, do you mean the doughnut research & spacecraft development one?

I don\'t now what parts I\'m missing then...

By the Nova Silisko pack, do you mean the doughnut research & spacecraft development one?

Yes, but also his lunar lander pack which he released separately.

Well I also have the lunar lander pack so I don\'t know what parts I don\'t have.

I know this will probably be quite a hassle for you but do you think you could make

a list of the parts it uses so that I can see exactly which one I don\'t have because

I have no idea what parts I could be missing.

If that\'s not too much of a hassle, thanks.
